entry.title: Overview
entry.heading: Introduction
entry.para: This is an application for displaying news and other data from various sources. You can subscribe to the information you are interested in, so you only see what you want to.

entry.title: Feed Types
entry.heading: Internal Feeds
entry.para: Feeds that are managed and provided by this system.
entry.heading: Composite Feeds
entry.para: Feeds that get their content from multiple internal feeds.
